popt4jlib.LocalSearch

Interface IntSetNeighborhoodFilterIntf

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NeighborhoodFilterIntf
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GRASPPackerIntSetNbrhoodFilter, GRASPPackerIntSetNbrhoodFilter2, GRASPPackerIntSetNbrhoodFilter3

    public interface IntSetNeighborhoodFilterIntf
extends NeighborhoodFilterIntf
    extension of NeighborhoodFilterIntf class to work specifically with Set<Integer> arg solutions and Integers as "guides".

    Title: popt4jlib
